channel.title: Help with customs
channel.description:
Hi guys im modeling atm a sword atm but i just dont know how to add them into game btw to class8 something goes wrong i dont know how to code it im trying everything always an other error serverside like an java error or clientside where it crashes could some1 help me pls with teamviver or any other way pls?
this is the model im doing atm[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,669735.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,669735.0.html[/url]
ty

item.title: Help with customs
item.dc:creator: @ayeitswill ayeitswill
item.description:
@ayeitswill wrote:

open the dat maker, say right ahnded weapon with pri of 10. make the dat and then zgip the file. from there you should rename it the number you want it to be on your server, and use that for the class8 ints. between 1-15,000 is a good number. same for the drop model but make sure it is no animation and pri of 10. after that you have to add the models into the game with ::add model (model ID) or “add model (model ID)” anyways, if it works then awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with customs
item.dc:creator: @Zephyrs Zephyrs
item.description:
@Zephyrs wrote:

I’m not very familiar with customs (I only have 2, and my friend helped with them), but this post belongs here -> https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,397355.0.html

item.title: Help with customs
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I don’t know much about modelling but I think you would need to convert your model files into .dat format if your client preloads models and then create your own zooms etc.

Read full topic
